content: --लभ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} difficult to be attained, or accomplished; <ls>R. 1. 67</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 70</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 40</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">5. 46</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 5.">61.</ls> {2} difficult to be found or met with, scarce, rare; शुद्धांतदुर्लभं <ls>Ś. 1. 16.</ls> {3} best, excellent, eminent. {4} dear, beloved. {5} costly.
